# DataTables

## minimalistic

_Given_ a simple data table

| foo | bar |
|-----|-----|
| boz | boo |

_And_ a data table with a single cell

| foo |
|-----|

_And_ a data table with different fromatting

| foo | bar | boz |
|-----|-----|-----|

_And_ a data table with an empty cell

| foo |  | boz |
|-----|--|-----|

_And_ a data table with comments and newlines inside

| foo  | bar  |
|------|------|
| boz  | boo  |
| boz2 | boo2 |
